data.message: Eminem doesn't look too bad with one! He's always been a good looking guy some people do look attractive with beards!  I have never seen him with a beard! Couldn't imagine him with one! The fans will get used to it! He went from blonde hair to his dark hair and got used to then he changed it back to blonde got used to it and now back to the darker hair and now a beard! He's still good looking so I'll get used to it!
